## nebula mcp-server

Launch Nebula's MCP server

### Synopsis

Launch Nebula's MCP server

```
nebula mcp-server [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --addr string   HTTP server address (default ":8080")
  -h, --help          help for mcp-server
      --http          Use HTTP transport instead of stdio
```
